title: Product gallery loads images correctly
description: Verify that the product gallery displays all images associated with a product and that images load without errors.

steps.description: Navigate to a Product Details Page containing a product gallery.
Check that all the images associated with the product are displayed in the gallery thumbnails.
Verify that the main gallery image loads correctly without visual errors.

title: Product gallery swipe functionality
description: Ensure the swipe feature in the product gallery allows users to navigate through images smoothly.

steps.description: Open the Product Details Page with multiple product images.
Perform swipe action on the gallery to move to the next image.
Confirm the displayed image changes to the next image in sequence.
Swipe backwards on the gallery.
Confirm the displayed image changes to the previous image without errors.

title: Product gallery zoom feature
description: Validate that the zoom functionality in the product gallery works correctly on images.

steps.description: Navigate to the product gallery on the Product Details Page.
Activate the zoom feature on a gallery image.
Verify that the image zooms in smoothly and details are visible without distortion.
Deactivate zoom and check the image returns to normal size.
Confirm image size resets correctly after zoom is closed.

title: Product card variants render properly
description: Verify all product card types (search, listing, featured) display correctly with accurate product information.

steps.description: Load product listing page to display product cards in search context.
Check SearchProductCard renders with correct product image, title, price, and description snippet.
Navigate to featured listing context where FeaturedProductCard is used.
Ensure FeaturedProductCard displays with enhanced visuals and correct product data.
Verify CompactProductCard in contexts requiring space-efficient display.
Validate CompactProductCard presents product info clearly and links to details page.

title: Product cards link to Product Details Page
description: Confirm that each product card navigates the user to the correct Product Details Page upon click.

steps.description: On a page with multiple product cards, click on a product card.
Verify the application navigates to the corresponding Product Details Page.
Check the Product Details Page displays information that matches the clicked product.

title: Product Details Page displays complete and accurate information
description: Ensure the Product Details Page shows all relevant product details including descriptions, pricing, availability, and gallery integration.

steps.description: Navigate to a Product Details Page.
Verify the product name, detailed description, price, availability, and any specifications are displayed accurately.
Confirm the embedded product gallery is present and functional.

title: Add products to Shopping Cart from product cards
description: Validate users can add products to the shopping cart directly from product cards with correct quantity and reflect updated cart state.

steps.description: On a product listing page, click the 'Add to Cart' button on a product card.
Verify the cart count increments by one and the product is added with default quantity.
Repeat adding the same product multiple times.
Confirm the product quantity in the cart updates accordingly.

title: Add products to Shopping Cart from Product Details Page
description: Ensure users can add desired quantities of a product to the cart from the Product Details Page.

steps.description: On the Product Details Page, set a specific product quantity.
Click the 'Add to Cart' button.
Verify that the shopping cart reflects the correct product and quantity added.

title: Shopping Cart page reflects product additions and removals
description: Confirm the Shopping Cart page correctly shows added products, allows quantity changes, and supports removing products.

steps.description: Navigate to the Shopping Cart page with items already added.
Check that all added products are listed with correct quantities and prices.
Increase the quantity of one product and update the cart.
Verify the quantity changes and total price updates accordingly.
Remove a product from the cart.
Confirm the product is removed and cart total adjusts properly.

title: Proceed to checkout from Shopping Cart
description: Validate that the user can successfully proceed from the Shopping Cart page to the checkout process.

steps.description: On Shopping Cart page with valid items, click the 'Proceed to Checkout' button.
Confirm that the navigation to checkout page or order confirmation process is initiated.

title: Order Success Page shows correct order details
description: Ensure the Order Success Page displays accurate order confirmation and details immediately after purchase completion.

steps.description: Complete an order from the checkout process.
Verify the Order Success Page loads showing order number, summary of purchased items, total amount, and confirmation message.

title: Orders Page lists past orders accurately
description: Verify that the Orders Page fetches and displays all historical orders with correct data and allows viewing detailed information per order.

steps.description: Navigate to the Orders Page.
Check that the page lists past orders with their respective dates, statuses, and totals.
Select an order from the list to view more details.
Verify detailed information matches the selected order including items, quantities, prices, and status.

title: Global state management consistency
description: Test that the global application state remains consistent across multiple components during user interactions without errors or race conditions.

steps.description: Add a product to the cart from a product card.
Check that the cart count updates globally and reflects on Shopping Cart page.
Modify product quantities in the Shopping Cart.
Ensure updated quantity is reflected in global state and on all relevant components (e.g., cart icon, product card badges).
Navigate between Orders Page, Product Details Page, and Cart Page.
Verify application state remains stable and consistent with no data loss or duplication.

title: Handle zero and negative product quantity inputs gracefully
description: Ensure the system handles edge cases where product quantity inputs are zero, negative, or invalid, preventing erroneous cart updates.

steps.description: On Product Details Page or Cart Page, input zero as product quantity.
Verify that the system prevents adding zero quantity or prompts user to correct input.
Input negative number or invalid characters as quantity.
Check that the input is sanitized or disallowed, and user is notified of invalid entry.

title: Product gallery handles missing or corrupted images
description: Test that the product gallery gracefully handles cases where images fail to load due to missing or corrupted file sources.

steps.description: Navigate to Product Details Page with a product that has missing or corrupted image files.
Verify that placeholder images or error messages are displayed instead of broken images.
Ensure gallery functions (swipe, zoom) do not crash or become unresponsive.

title: Shopping Cart handles simultaneous updates without race conditions
description: Verify that concurrent updates to the Shopping Cart (e.g., from multiple tabs or rapid user actions) maintain data integrity and consistent state.

steps.description: Open Shopping Cart page in two separate browser tabs.
Simultaneously add or remove products from both tabs.
Confirm that the application state remains synchronized and all changes are accurately reflected in both tabs.
